document.title: Career and Technology Education Standards template

4AA303D6C81449A6B9983580F7358AC9.description:
Demonstrate knowledge
and skills to incorporate
recycling and redesign
principles.

3A0B9CA00D5146B6A8AC663129AE94A0.description:
Design a
product for the home by
selecting a post-consumer
item to repurpose into a
new product.

866478FF52EE400381CA2DE37B08C8E2.description:
Explore
housing, interior, and
furnishings products that
are created using recycled
or redesigned items.

863A47F6A58E44939BD08F6D905CB037.description:
Develop a global view
to weigh design decisions with the
parameters of sustainability and
socioeconomic and cultural
contexts within the housing,
interior design, and furnishings
industries.

6FA127008DEE4EF4AC6E9E989837F65F.description:
Demonstrate knowledge
of multidisciplinary
collaboration and
consensus-building skills
needed in practice.

7CAFA2FAC7714B9DA1D10D84BF32373D.description:
Demonstrate knowledge
of the arts, of various
resources, and of cultural
impact upon design
industries.

C7EC167BFA604E8F979827568453D000.description:
Analyze
operational costs such as
markups, markdowns,
cash flow, and other
factors affecting profit.

64D84BABFBC546FB86340F1B844BA894.description:
Demonstrate procedures
for reporting and handling
accidents, safety, and
security incidents.

E2B60DDCBAAA456F8F75947421C464E8.description:
Describe
security and inventory
control strategies, laws,
regulations, and worksite
policies and procedures
that affect loss
prevention and profit.

E74DA606A5F3454F8D79FD7EAB258E43.description:
Analyze
legislation, regulations,
and public policy affecting
the housing, interiors, and
furnishing industries.

6746379BD03C4AD28372C8E0B0196582.description:
Solve
critical-thinking problems
related to housing, interiors,
and furnishings industries in
groups using leadership and
collaboration.

1D2C678510584E9D86BD74D0B1840A54.description:
Discuss the
importance of design
industries and their impact
on the local community.

25351F56855848F28FDCDEAA0ECB7C05.description:
Apply
procedures for maintaining
inventory control and loss
prevention, including cash
and credit transactions.

9F10F26FAB41401BB225E2C7FC181034.description:
Discuss
procedures for reporting
and handling accidents,
safety, and security
incidents.

AE638C040CA94989BB42EC4AC0E1FE09.description:
Analyze
personal and employer
responsibilities and
liabilities regarding
industry-related safety,
security, and
environmental factors.

767DB7069AB84203B491DC2745A74DE2.description:
Discuss
legislation, regulation, and
public policy affecting the
housing, interiors, and
furnishing industries.

4582F47659D0420992E5F9D4FB50CDD3.description:
Summarize how teamwork
and collaboration can help
in finding successful
solutions to difficult
problems.

2442A46022E34145895B67288E968253.description:
Define
design industries in the
local community.

71D0E52FFA05494E8A5D7259893A00F2.description:
Describe
how to report an accident.

99170CDE431C4DB893223CAE730B1EC2.description:
Identify
personal and employer
responsibilities and
liabilities.

C13D653B294449BF8C101359C13539B9.description:
Recognize
the importance of
legislative regulations and
public policies.

BC8F0E5811A644A6A3687FE26722E4FE.description:
Analyze professional
practices, procedures for business
profitability and career success,
and the role of ethics in the
housing, interiors, and furnishings
industries.

711F78D514524BA9B76EC1DEAF004034.description:
Utilize
applicable building codes
and universal guidelines
and regulations in space
planning.

F7486569200B490F999BBEE1E4E7D49C.description:
Utilize a
variety of presentation
media, including
drawings, photography,
video, computer, and
software for client
presentations.

2DE5EDE37073478F9AC9FE1F7E2574E1.description:
Create
floor plans using
architectural drafting
skills and computer-aided
design software.

40DF476DB8A94934A632FED38FE76D39.description:
Identify
building codes, universal
guidelines, and regulations
in space planning.

71424BF4FFEA47F0808257E96D3BFE72.description:
Prepare
visual presentations,
including legends, keys, and
schedules.

7D2E7A0618D84230B673337A06985D86.description:
Prepare
sketches, elevations,
perspectives, and rendering
using appropriate media.

3CE54C3AAFBA4199B5E413834A664EB8.description:
Identify
needs for a housing
presentation.

90F25F9E257B482980007F3BBEA7B02C.description:
Apply design
knowledge, skills, processes, and
theories and oral, written, and
visual presentation skills to
communicate design ideas.

F96BA3AE83CA4B2598373AE081AAD879.description:
Justify
design solutions relative
to client needs, including
diversity and cultural
needs, and the design
process.

C93EF660E31A433CB44A2416F6802EB9.description:
Assess a
variety of available
resources for housing and
interior design, such as
evidence-based design,
that account for human
factors and issues of
human behaviors.

50B6E67815ED484BB17B50814B1D0C4B.description:
Critique
design plans to address
client needs, goals, and
resources.

75BB9FBB4E4B497289D3F5A77A944243.description:
Assess
client's community, family,
and financial resources
needed to achieve housing
and interior design goals.

9B72D6D402534ACA855E3DB003DA2B7F.description:
Discuss
different plans that address
client needs and resources.

3C67871F19364E2D88D98D0516D8332A.description:
Assess
financial resources needed
to improve interior space.

F5EAD0B1215745BCB7EA916422D2A817.description:
Evaluate client's
needs, goals, and resources in
creating design plans for housing
and residential and commercial
interiors.

198AF9FE5D6A47D3ABBF3E05D08BF702.description:
Predict
future design and
development trends in
architecture, interiors,
and furnishings.

F852BC469B2A4A27A38EDF078B33B9EF.description:
Illustrate
the development of
architectural styles
throughout history.

C6754FDBA5D14D89AA7D34DEC99C8DF1.description:
Compare
and contrast historical
architectural details to
current housing and
interior design trends.

94E45CE871904871846AB2A78D35735C.description:
Explain
societal and technological
trends in periods of
architecture and interior
design through the ages.

171C869A5D3142CD9843C289C9A48CC1.description:
Discuss
trends in housing and
interior design.

FEB3B5F353FD4B2E835D5B5092FAC6BA.description:
Describe
features of furnishings that
are characteristic of
various historical periods.

A801BE28253E4DE6AD253E06B241545D.description:
Analyze design and
development of architecture,
interiors, and furnishings through
the ages.

E6E0A9DBA76B488EA58163D78B7BA788.description:
Demonstrate graphic
communication skills,
such as CAD, PowerPoint,
and sketching.

3CBE481F120F4959A4F47098719365E6.description:
Apply
building codes, universal
design guidelines, and
regulations in space
planning and
arrangement of furniture
and furnishings.

311DE40BC3B449A4B5C5CE33A971F106.description:
Evaluate
floor plans for efficiency
and safety in areas
including but not limited
to zones; traffic patterns;
storage; and electrical,
plumbing, ventilation, and
thermal systems.

29B7F63603DD4960957F3F9FD9914008.description:
Draft an
interior space to scale
using architectural
symbols.

324AD7161B824CF2AFBF8E671CE6ED43.description:
Create an
interior space to
mathematically accurate
scale and correct
architectural symbols using
an online tool.

51CB6C59B10F42889ED711B38A90992E.description:
Arrange
furniture placement with
reference to principles of
design, traffic flow, activity,
and existing architectural
features.

D2041E5342324A1F9FA4413E9CEB6926.description:
Arrange
furniture placement with
reference to principles of
design, traffic flow, activity,
and existing architectural
features.

8BDE899BB1514743A1CFACD200AD951D.description:
Interpret
information provided on
design, construction, and
other industry-related
interior design documents.

26A19B1F68A44D27A4C74EEC570FCAFA.description:
Explore
online tools that could be
used in creating graphic
communication of a design
in housing and interior
design.

ADB6FA0F6FA3491085941BDDB6375905.description:
Discuss
space planning in the home.

E764F88171BD44408CD792768A2C54AD.description:
Identify
the traffic flow of a floor
plan based on the activities
conducted in the space and
existing architectural
features.

5B0D98006D0E4CD9AF5178DB83B4A7A6.description:
Identify
information provided on
floor plans.

9764E226543148D1BD42D28F9BEBF501.description:
Demonstrate design,
construction document reading,
and space planning skills required
for the housing, interior design, and
furnishings industries.

B87127AB70C044488B7FCA625B90811D.description:
Demonstrate design
processes such as
determining the scope of
the project, programming,
research, concept
development, schematic
design, design drawing,
and design development
and presentation.

9570DA2FDE3D4C83862F210EEB984688.description:
Examine
the impact of housing,
interiors, and furnishings
on the health, safety, and
welfare of the public.

DCE569A60A834BAC858DB998C283C3CE.description:
Appraise
various interior
furnishings, finishes,
fixtures, appliances, and
equipment to provide
cost and quality choices
for clients.

0165D88A45B140D19C311D7724B152DC.description:
Evaluate
manufacturers, products,
and materials considering
building codes and
regulations,
environmental
protection, care and
maintenance, and safety
issues.

94E6BFF2C9D44DE19426893BFC458E38.description:
Analyze
product information,
including but not limited
to floor coverings, wall
coverings, textiles,
window treatments,
furniture, lighting
fixtures, kitchen and bath
fixtures, and equipment.

8572978E765C47C880B55861C741885A.description:
Interpret
residential and commercial
interior design schematic
renderings and design
drawings.

8E549C4AD8D34D48BD3225776B0306C2.description:
Investigate
cost and quality choices of
interior furnishings,
appliances, and equipment
for clients, with analysis of
product life cycle.

8C782E53E16944C9935A6291AB374BD2.description:
Demonstrate measuring,
estimating, ordering,
purchasing, pricing, and
repurposing skills.

68D786341C6C454DB0B0A806DDFDFBE5.description:
Summarize
basic environmental
protection, care and
maintenance, and safety
issues when creating
residential and commercial
interior design space.

795F4A13F48A4F8D83E68A4ABEFC7097.description:
Provide
examples of different types
of floor coverings, wall
coverings, textiles, window
treatments, furniture,
lighting fixtures, kitchen and
bath fixtures, and
equipment.

84AF03CA81564D8BAD7FAB76EB5D712E.description:
Identify
the steps in residential and
commercial design
development.

F18CF35514F849CD89F546921B0EBEB9.description:
Identify
the types of furniture and
appliances needed in
individual situations.

E8388E0909744A7EA3F60705CA125D9B.description:
Identify
manufacturers’ products
and materials considering
care, maintenance, safety,
and environmental
protection issues.

5E703203C4A74200B577FB089BA106F4.description:
Identify
different floor coverings
and wall coverings.

FAEBD2EDC11643838942422A4EB4B334.description:
Apply residential and
commercial interior design
knowledge, skills, and processes to
meet specific design needs.

45E187C1F6D545B7904BCF6612C12361.description:
Apply
principles of human
behavior, such as
ergonomics and
anthropometrics, to the
design of housing,
interiors, and furnishings.

9A7EC5F780144D6F8AF66398028B3FDB.description:
Analyze
the effects that the
principles and elements of
design have on aesthetics
and function.

7990F58DB5604588834A2EA714F08FD5.description:
Analyze
the psychological impact
that the principles and
elements of design have
on the individual.

E63849DEDEDA4CC88481E5E929A3E3C4.description:
Identify
principles of human
behavior such as
ergonomics and
anthropometrics, to the
design of housing, interiors,
and furnishings.

5793C00E11634545B87118661BEED05E.description:
Identify the
effects that the principles
and elements of design have
on aesthetics and function.

55771EFE2D1A4055A1FD3038E5F0BBBF.description:
Evaluate
the use of elements and
principles of design in
housing and commercial
and residential interiors.

0B725299F5574D8CB191EAAC976FDB6C.description:
Demonstrate appropriate
sizing and shapes of
proportions.

267EBC9C587A4788B6854D71905EBF37.description:
Identify
the principles and elements
of design.

4AF5E44F679D49358D121A2B36850CBF.description:
Evaluate housing and
design concepts and theories,
including sustainability and
universal design in relation to
available resources and options.

D1146E588478486EA59FD86497CF96BB.description:
Analyze
the attitudes, traits, and
values of professional
responsibility,
accountability, and
effectiveness required for
careers in housing and
interior design.

5BBFE2842B6E4C8D8552DA897BF0A180.description:
Analyze
the role of professional
organizations in housing
and interior design
professions.

E13D068F9D684E87B74BA1C9234173E6.description:
Analyze
the financial benefits of
interior design to
individuals, families, and
society including financial
benefits of careers in
housing, interior design,
and furnishings on local,
state, national, and global
economies.

F9A2C752564C45A3A39462D3310C3C0D.description:
Create
an employment portfolio
to communicate
knowledge and skills
needed in housing and
interior design careers.

8A4D06FE2B1448DAAC11A01B6DF8F226.description:
Analyze
career paths and
opportunities for
employment and
entrepreneurial
endeavors.

655E11D8250A4495B752DD4A3F54D2A8.description:
Distinguish
between positive and
negative professional

who works in a career
related to housing and
interior design.

1F8BFB0FAAE34409AD4629CB46DB6E23.description:
Explore the
role of professional
organizations in housing and
interior design professions.

4958C107261949DE87E80A228B057EB7.description:
Investigate
the impact of housing,
interiors, and furnishings
careers on local, state,
national, and global
economies.

8320794AF63C455784EB603E5C218986.description:
Summarize

AEAD570D7BB947F0AF43FECA0B74BD9F.description:

roles and functions of

furnishings careers.

148A6CF6445545ACBD13656E1B7E05FB.description:

attitudes, traits, and values

in a career related to
housing and interior design.

F6E01A9A64584258BD8D4465D1CE1E13.description:
Identify
qualities of an effective and
productive employee.

829DD4BAC74746F1B1290208058B0419.description:

career paths in housing,
interiors, and furnishings.

E3AB317F170A4EEB8314C30C353680FD.description:

labor market information
and its impact on
employment opportunities
within housing, interiors,
and furnishings.

AAEB53E319C043F3834159F26DDAB819.description:
Analyze career paths
within the housing, interiors, and
furnishings industries.

9AE289352D8C42738D1459A97608DC4B.description:
Students will integrate knowledge, skills, and practices required for careers in housing, interiors, and
furnishings.
